code: import axios from"axios";export var getPosts=function getPosts(){return axios.get("/api/posts");};export var getUserPosts=function getUserPosts(id){return axios.get("/api/posts/user/".concat(id));};export var writePost=function writePost(data){return axios.post("/api/posts/",data);};export var getPost=function getPost(id){return axios.get("/api/posts/".concat(id));};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("/api/posts/".concat(id));};
